ray.renderer

Class MultipleIlluminator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.renderer.DirectIlluminator
      • ray.renderer.MultipleIlluminator

  • public class MultipleIlluminator
extends DirectIlluminator
    This class computes direct illumination using a combination of the strategies used by BRDFIlluminator and LuminairesIlluminator. With probability lumProb, it generates a sample using the luminaires; otherwise it generates the sample using the BRDF. The returned sample is weighted according to Veach & Guibas's balance heuristic, which requires computing the
    Author:
    Changxi Zheng (at Columbia)

        public void directIllumination(Scene scene,
                               Vector3 incDir,
                               Vector3 outDir,
                               IntersectionRecord iRec,
                               Point2 seed,
                               Color outColor)
        Here we implement a simplified version. We assume each estimator contribute the same amount of samples. Each time this directIllumination method is invoked, it samples for each of estimator, and combine the results together by weighting function 1. for each estimator, sample value f*L/p 2. compute weight value 3. add the weighted sample
